price: Àwọn tó ń fi ìnira kan àwọn onígbàgbọ́ òdodo lọ́kùnrin àti onígbàgbọ́ òdodo lóbìnrin nípa n̄ǹkan tí wọn kò ṣe, dájúdájú wọ́n ti ru ẹrù (ọ̀ràn) ìparọ́mọ́ni àti ẹ̀ṣẹ̀ pọ́nńbélé.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡذُونَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ بِغَيۡرِ مَا ٱكۡتَسَبُواْ فَقَدِ ٱحۡتَمَلُواْ بُهۡتَٰنٗا وَإِثۡمٗا مُّبِينٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yu'dhūna al-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti bighayri mā ik'tasabū faqadi iḥ'tamalū buh'tānan wa-ith'man mubīnan
